name: Advanced Potion-Making
description: a N.E.W.T.-level textbook used in Potions class; students who achieved an 'Outstanding' or an 'Exceeds Expectation' on their Ordinary Wizarding Level

name: Advanced Potion-Making
description: This copy originally cost 9 gallleons. Selling it for 2 Galleons

name: Magical Theory
description: Magical Theory written by Adalbert Waffling is a required textbook for first year at Hogwarts.It is available at the Hogwarts Library, or for sale at Flourish and Blotts bookstore for two Galleons.

name: A History of Magic
description: A required text for all Hogwarts students for the History of Magic class taught by Professor Binns. Never liked this class, selling it for 4 Galleons.

name: The Care Of Magical Creatures Companion Guide
description: The required textbook for Transfiguration classes for 1st and 2nd year students at Hogwarts. New copy costs 2 galleon.
location: Common Room, behind the Fat Lady portrait

name: A Beginner's Guide to Transfiguration
description: This textbook was used as an introduction to Transfiguration, it contained basic transformation spells. A copy of this book costs 1 Galleon at Flourish and Blotts

name: Magical Boots
description: A pair of magical boots once worn by Victor Krum. Start selling at 10.5 Galleons. Price may increse.

name: Gift from Hogsmeade Village
description: A gift from my ex. Bought from Hogsmeade during Chirstmas. It will make your room snow.

name: Winter Beanie
description: A beanie keeps you warm in northern lands. Moving to south, selling at 2 galleons.

name: Notes for CIT 594
description: Printed notes and all study materials for CIT 594 Data Structure and software design. Taken during 2020 summer.

name: Introduction to Computing Systems
description: This is the required textbook for CIT 593:Introduction to Computer Systems, instructed by Dr. Thomas Farmer. 2nd Edition.
